description.rules:
Market Information

Which trap will produce the most winners from both of this evenings Racing Post Greyhound TV meetings?

Bets are unaffected by Reserve Traps, Vacant traps or Void races. In the event of either meeting not starting all bets will be void. This market will be turned IN PLAY with unmatched bets cancelled at the start of the first race. If a race results in a dead heat each trap will receive a half-win, with a 3-way dead heat one third-win, and so on. For further information please see our Rules & Regs.

Customers should be aware that:

  • Transmissions described as “live” by some broadcasters may actually be delayed

  • The extent of any such delay may vary, depending on the set-up through which they are receiving pictures or data.
